source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEQ_00<tab>Seizau needs the help of a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> with sharp eyes and quick reflexes.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEQ_00<tab>スイの里のセイザウは、地上から来た者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_TODO_00<tab>Obtain cuts of ruby hornbill breast meat from ruby hornbills.
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the cuts of ruby hornbill breast meat to Seizau.

TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_000<tab>If your sun-kissed skin is any indication, you have come here from the world above. Sadly for you, we are an extremely tight-knit and self-sufficient community and do not have any work for outsiders.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_000その肌の日焼け……貴様、陸者（おかもの）だな？
この里は、すべて自給自足で賄い生活している。
余所者に頼む仕事などないぞ？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_001<tab>Ah, wait─perhaps that is not necessarily true. I have just thought of a task only one of your kind will be able to carry out. Tell me, are you any good at hunting birds?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_001……いや、そんなこともないか。
陸者だからこそ、頼める仕事がひとつだけあった。
貴様、鳥を狩るのは、うまいか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_002<tab>Very good! In that case, I would like for you to bring me back the breast meat of three ruby hornbills.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_002自信があるというなら、頼みたいことがある。
ベッコウ島にいる「」を狩って、
「」を3塊ほど、獲ってきてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_003<tab>There should be plenty of ruby hornbills at the Isle of Bekko. Please, bring me back the breast meat of three of these birds.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_003ベッコウ島にいる「」を狩って、
「」を3塊ほど、獲ってきてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_010<tab>Do you have what I asked for?

TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_011<tab>These cuts you have brought me are beautiful. Excellent work. I have, for far too long, craved the taste of bird meat. You see, many years ago, a cage fell from a ship passing above. Within it was a bird. The moment its flesh touched my lips I knew no food, however fine, could compare.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_011うーむ、身が引き締まった、いい肉だ。
かつて、大きな鳥籠が船から落ちてきたことがあってな。
籠の中の鳥を食したところ、虜になってしまった。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_012<tab>We receive so few visitors from the surface that it is next to impossible to procure such meat─or any meat at all, in fact. All the Kojin merchants ever bring is seafood.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_012なにせ、里には陸者など滅多に来ない。
碧甲羅の商人から得られる食材も、海産物ばかり……。
肉のあの味が、恋しくなるのも無理からぬことだろう？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_013<tab>Before you go, I have one question for you. If I'm not mistaken, birds have appendages that allow them to soar the skies. You do not look as though you can fly, so how is it that you were able to capture these magnificent winged creatures?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_013そういえば、鳥とは空を飛ぶものだろう？
貴様は飛べるわけでもなさそうなのに、
どうやって捕らえるというのだ？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_014<tab>You anger them and when they come to attack you, you pounce? Hahaha! You people from the land are a ferocious lot.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_014なんと真っ向勝負を挑んで、鳥を怒らせ、
こちらに向かってくるように仕向けると……。
いやはや、陸者は荒々しいものなのだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_015<tab>Slowly, I come to understand the decision my ancestors made to seek refuge in the seas. Anyroad, thank you for bringing me my meat. My siblings and I shall feast tonight!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ301_02697_SEIZAU_000_015祖先が争いを避け、海に潜ったのも頷けるというものだ。
ともあれ、肉を獲ってきてくれて、心から感謝する。
兄弟とともに、ありがたく食させてもらう。
